title: Sealed Product
description: A sealed product is a set of multiple other yugioh products, such as a tin or a booster box. NOTE: This database is not populated with most booster boxes; the existence of such is indicated by the 'packsPerBox' property in set JSONs.

id.description: The UUID of this sealed product. The name of the product's file should be this UUID.

date.description: The release date for this product, if known. Only used in virtual products.

name.description: A mapping of language to product names. In physical products, if the locales object has a mapping for this language, then this name is official, else it is unofficial.

locales.description: A mapping of locale to locale-specific information.

date.description: The release date for this product, if known.

image.description: A URL to a image of this product in this locale, if available. Use this in preference to the 'image' field in 'contents'.

externalIDs.description: IDs and other information, to access this set from various other sites.

dbIDs.description: Any official Yugioh database IDs for this product.

items.description: An official Yugioh database ID for this product.

contents.description: The contents of this product. These contents might differ by locale. Virtual products have just one entry here.

locales.description: The locales these contents apply to. Not present in virtual products.

image.description: A URL to a image of this product, if available. Use the 'image' field in 'locales' first if also available.

packs.description: The set of packs (and other promo cards) this product contains.

items.description: A number of packs/cards from a set.

set.description: The UUID of the set you are pulling from.

qty.description: The number of packs of this type we're including in this product. Default 1.

history.description: Physical products have a release date. Virtual products, furthermore, may also be revoked, and even re-added, at Konami's whim. This array of periods of availability tracks both.

items.description: A span of time this product was (or is, or will be) available.

startDate.description: The date this product was made available. Optional, if you don't know when it debuted.

endDate.description: The date this product was revoked. Optional, if it is still available.

externalIDs.description: IDs and other information, to access this set from various other sites.

id.description: The internal wiki ID for the Yugipedia page for this product.

name.description: The Yugipedia page name for this product.
